summary: REQ-5 is partially implemented: the contact email value in `frontend/src/config/site.ts` was updated to exactly `hello.quickbeeagency,com`. However, the diff summary does not show changes to the footer and Contact page to ensure their displayed email text and `mailto:` links reflect the updated value.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the mailto link in the footer uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows a modification to `frontend/src/config/site.ts` plus metadata files; it does not show any change to the footer component where the mailto link would be implemented/verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Contact page shows `hello.quickbeeagency,com` and its mailto link uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include any actual diff for the Contact page component (only a high-level description in `frontend-file-summaries.txt`), so there is no evidence that the displayed email and mailto link were updated/verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata (`project_state.json`) with new_feature_requests entries unrelated to implementing the frontend email change.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; the request is limited to updating the email value and ensuring UI reflects it, with constraints to avoid unrelated changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` content describing many site pages/components and features (e.g., router pages, pricing tiers, new services, contact form behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the BuildRequest scope is narrowly limited to updating the contact email and ensuring all UI locations reflect it, without other copy/layout/styling changes.
